title: Any Rioter want to join me for my 1000th win?
body:
I'm currently at 998 wins, hoping to get any and all Rioters in here for the big 1K!

pref Mid, but I'd be cool playing anywhere <3
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 
- Slythion

replies.body: I'm totes down but I'm B2 trash but I play a pretty mean Ali support. Up to you bb
let's do ittttt! What time/day works best for you? ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=Slythion,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=uEm3MEnz,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-07-06T20:41:25.963+0000)
>
> let's do ittttt! What time/day works best for you? ^-^

Awesome possum, pretty much any time tomorrow would be cool! Is there an hour that works for you?
Any time after 3pm (eastern time zone) works for me! Does 4pm sound good? That should give me time to grab some food after work and finish up some other stuff
but that's only for the mode you played last, and ranked queues are reset each season.

Ya idk how to tell for total

All I know is that I'm sitting a 999 wins for normal draft

How can I check how many wins I have in total?

Will rioters join me on a Twisted Treeline milestone? :D
it should be in the top-left corner of your screen in the post-game lobby <3
